title: Three for society
creator_credit: Samaritan Films, Carole K. Smith and Peter K. Smith
brief_description: Documentary on cerebral palsy, where the three individuals speak for themselves - about their illness, their physical distress and difficulties in communicating, but especially about their inward feeling of normality the world cannot see.
creator_credit_for_label: Samaritan Films, Carole K. Smith and Peter K. Smith
